product_name: Pepper's Roxanne Polarized Sunglasses - Teal Tortoise Frame - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A sunny-day essential with a chic frame that goes from tortoise to teal, the Pepper's Roxanne Sunglasses shelter your eyes with glare-cutting polarized lenses. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement, for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Pepper's Roxanne Polarized Sunglasses feature polarized brown lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Closeout.
short_description: A sunny-day essential with a chic frame that goes from tortoise to teal, the Pepper's Roxanne Sunglasses shelter your eyes with glare-cutting polarized lenses.
